vote.title: Authorize a five-year service price agreement for vehicle and equipment rental for the Department of Equipment and Fleet Management - Ahern Rentals, CLS Sewer Equipment Co. Inc., EAN Holdings, LLC dba Enterprise Rent-A-Car, H&E Equipment Services, Inc., Herc Rentals, Inc., Holt Texas, LTD, Metro Golf Cars, National Equipment Dealers, LLC, RushCo Energy Specialists, Inc., Sunbelt Rentals, Inc., Sunstate Equipment Company, and United Rentals (North America), Inc. dba Reliable Onsite Services, lowest responsible bidders of thirteen - Estimated amount of $13,960,073.21 - Financing:  General Fund ($3,471,665.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($9,086,438.21), Bond Program Administration Fund ($964,860.00), and Sanitation Services Fund ($437,110.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
